titleInfo.title: Pond at Chalmette monument very shallow due to lack of rainfall. Anopheles larvae on top of algal scum in spite of fish. 1 ft deep. About 30 ft diameter. Pond 2. Separate note, No scum or larvae November 1. Rainfall heavy October 28

mods.abstract: Camera looking across pond with reeds in foreground and a few trees beyond. Possibly related to F0003
